website_summaries.verdict: Large container of catnip that delivers a good price per ounce in a tightly sealed jar.
pros: Product will stay fresh between uses, thanks to the plastic container
Jar has a shaker top, simplifying the process of adding it to toys or food
Ships in a 2-ounce jar, so you'll receive a good value, especially in multi-cat homes
cons: Isn't quite as potent as some other blends

customer_reviews.title: Always great until this time...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why this last container of this very same catnip is different, but it smells different and my cat won't have anything to do with it. I have purchased this product before and never had this problem. I wonder if somehow they have changed it in some way. I'd like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: flashpoint

customer_reviews.title: Wondering if this is really catnip?
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem like catnip. does nothing for my cat who normally goes crazy for catnip. smells like weak tea. On the plus side- no sticks to pick out like the other catnips. I read reviews where a cat got a little stem piece stuck in its throat and needed surgery so I am careful to avoid that.
customer_reviews.author: K. Aaland

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This used to be the best organic catnip out there, but now it's made in China instead of Canada, and with the move, it's gone from pleasant-smelling and fresh to brown, foul-smelling crap. It literally smells like it's been in a box next to a coal furnace for the last five years, soaking up the stench. The cats are not impressed. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has this changed??
customer_reviews.text: I agree with others that this catnip is very weak. Funny thing is that it used to be my cats' very favorite catnip, leading me to think it has changed. The two-ounce canister has printed on it: "Made in China" / "Manufactured for Worldwise Inc., Dept SK...Novato, CA". So product seems to come from China, while the company itself is in CA. That's how I read it. My previous SmartyKat container (a smaller package) had these words: "grown and packed in USA". Those words are noticeably missing from the 2 oz product. Scary. And yes, it's filled with sticks and twigs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I have 4 cats and they love this catnip
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and they love this catnip. I call it kitty crack because they are addicted. I cant leave the package anywhere they can get to it or they will chew it open and indulge. I sprinkle it on a circular cardboard box bed and scratching pad and they bump each other out of the way to get to it. They roll in it and eat it and are hysterical to watch. For even more fun, I use a pin light to drive them wild. Give your cats a treat you wont soon forget.
customer_reviews.author: JillieBean08

customer_reviews.title: Not what it was like back in the day..
customer_reviews.text: I use to purchase this a long time ago for my cats, and it seemed very leafy, green, smelled very fresh. Now when I purchased this, it looks like cheap oregano, dusty, doesn’t have much of a smell. My cat doesn’t seem to want anything to do with it either. The cat nip is extremely fine in texture as compared to another higher quality brand that I have bought, but this I’m also questioning as well with other people if it is really even cat nip. I won’t be buying this anymore as my cat eats cat nip, and I don’t feel this is a very safe option as it’s not like how the company use to make.
customer_reviews.author: Charmane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cats don't care about it at all
customer_reviews.text: My cats do not like this at all. They love catnip. The crappy kind that comes free with toys. Home grown. Mass produced brand. Doesn't matter, they love catnip. They do but pay attention to this at all. Sprinkling it, piles of it. Nothing. It might as well be leaves crushed up from outside.
customer_reviews.author: A Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: in fact it barely smells like catnip. Sure
customer_reviews.text: This catnip does not have a strong smell, in fact it barely smells like catnip. Sure, it is organic, but in the case of catnip (unlike skincare) not having a strong catnip-y smell is actually a big negative. My spoiled cat absolutely ignores this catnip. None of the fun and games he had with other catnip products. For us, unfortunately, ordering this was a waste of money. Cant even donate it to a cat rescue, as the package is now opened. Who knows - maybe your cat will have a different reaction. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: fang blehTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat wasn't big on this strain. Not sure if its a sativa or indica...
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Soothes the Savage Beast!
customer_reviews.text: Drives our kitty Bug nuts, so clearly it works. She'd give it two thumbs up -- if she had thumbs. (And let me tell you, that little factoid really pisses her off. Fortunately, she has her SmartyKat catnip to chill her out, so she doesn't kill me in the night for having thumbs.) Thanks, SmartyKat, for keeping my kitty happy and keeping me alive!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this. Waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm this doesn’t seem to be catnip. As with all the other one star reviews (which I should have read before purchasing), this stuff doesn’t work at all. My cat loves catnip. And had ZERO reaction to this. It smells like grass, it’s not effective. Might as well get some grass clippings from my lawnmower, put them in a bag and sell it on Amazon as catnip. This is a huge waste, very disappointed. Not worth the shipping to return...Dont buy this unless you like feeling disappointed. This product will not give your cat the ‘catnip experience’ you are hoping for. Wish I knew that before I ordered. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer James

customer_reviews.title: Whatever this formula is,it DOES NOT WORK like all the other cat nips that I have purchased and experience over the last 8 years
customer_reviews.text: My female cat absolutely loves catnip and any kind!!! What a giant waste this was!!! She is completely uninterested and it has been sitting in my kitchen cabinet for months. I feel guilty throwing it away but I don't think anyone else is cats would like it... Who knows? Save your money and get something else! Believe it or not my kitty goes batshit over the free packets of catnip that are included in the 1 800 PetMeds orders! Lol :-) good luck
customer_reviews.author: S. Mankowski

customer_reviews.title: Catnip Loving Cat Avoids this Product
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves catnip so I ordered this when we were about to run out of the catnip I purchased locally quite some time ago. My cat sniffed this stuff and walked away. No interest in it at all. I have offered this catnip to my cat several more times and each time she has a strange look and quickly leaves. She has always loved catnip and never rejected any brand that I have purchased in the past. This batch is either (1) so old it is worthless, (2) contaminated and the cat knows it or (3) not catnip at all. A waste of money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K.

customer_reviews.title: Full of twigs and sticks
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping my cat would love this, but he just doesn't. Normally he loves cat nip, so it leads me to believe there is something about this product he doesn't care for. I'm not a huge fan of the twigs and sticks that are spread throughout the product. I've had other catnips that were not like that. I'll probably end up buying a different brand and giving this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s organic - but my cat did not seem to like it. Constantly sneezed when he came near it & acted like his paws were itchy & kept licking at them. Don’t think I’d buy again for that reason. Also adding I tried it again & found dead lady bugs in it. Yuck. Told amazon & they issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Yea boi, this is that chrondo dank stank.
customer_reviews.text: Fire nugs for the lil furry homies. Straight gas. This is that top shelf piff. This fire tree will have you all happy and frolicking, rubbing your face on everything.
customer_reviews.author: B.A

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what's different...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product before and my cats have always rolled in it and gobbled it up. But this time, they are leaving so much on the carpet that I have to vacuum up after them right away. Also, the lid is useless - not enough cat nip will shake out to keep my little ones happy - I have to unscrew the top completely and gently disperse it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Worst Catnip I have ever bought for MaximumKatness.
customer_reviews.text: It was brown, very dry and void of catnip smell. MaximumKatness always gets enthralled when he is given catnip but this stuff he sniffs once then walks away. I am very disappointed in this brand and will find a different brand to buy,
customer_reviews.author: HappyLemonHead

customer_reviews.title: Great for refreshing those catnip toys that have list their allure.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend’s cat enjoys the little catnip stuffed mice I buy at the pet store....for a couple of days. Then they seem to lose their oomph. One day I had a bright idea. Put a depleted mouse in the jar of catnip my girlfriend wouldn’t let me sprinkle on the carpet. Dropped one in for a couple of days. Took it out. Shook it off. Tossed it toward the cat. Instant party! I think that cat is nuttier for the refreshed mice than he was for them fresh from the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: CDFoote

customer_reviews.title: This is the only catnip I've ever tried that my cats didn't go nuts over.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this twice. The first time the cats liked for a little while then ignored it completely. I think it went stale. I was willing to give it a second chance since at the time I couldn't find another source for organically grown catnip, but the second one was stale from day 1. I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it , he doesn't go CRAZY though...
customer_reviews.text: I'v had nip where my cat will go NUTS, and ive had nip where my cat will be like "nah, pass" this is somewhere in between, although he will play with it or eat it or whatever the hell he does with this stuff, its not the stuff that makes him zoom around the house. in other words he likes it "enough" maybe i just have a cat that is too picky OR maybe i just made it all about me with this purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jurado

customer_reviews.title: My cats hated this catnip
customer_reviews.text: My cats love catnip but hate this stuff. It has virtually zero smell to me and when my cats sniffed it, they just walked away. My two cats usually love catnip, so I assume this is old old stuff that lacks any smell. Worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: daniell

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite
customer_reviews.text: Every Amazon box big enough to hold a cat gets this sprinkled inside. They love it. I've been using the brand for years now and never got any that didn't drive the cats wild. It does seem to lose a bit of scent if you leave it open too long but that rarely happens here, I get at least one Amazon box a week.
customer_reviews.author: A reader, a crafter, a gardener and cookTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: A good size for a cheap price but price is everything apparently. My cat wont even touch it and she loves cat nip. I had a more expensive brand at one point and she went crazy as soon as she smelled the bag open. I put this to her nose and she moves away. Leave a pile of it for her to go to or put some in a sock for her to play with and its left untouched all day. I dont know why but because of that i cannot recommend it. There must be a reason why my cat hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Cavan

customer_reviews.title: The cats seem to like this. We were running low on the 'nip ...
customer_reviews.text: The cats seem to like this. We were running low on the 'nip and I turned to Amazon to find some, so I didn't have to go out and actually, you know, talk to people. I got the 2 oz container, opened it up and saw that the 'nip was for the most part, finely ground, and had a nice aroma to it. The cats also thought this, and promptly came to investigate the toy that holds the 'nip. Dill rubbed her face on it and Pickles ripped the top off the toy to dump the contents on the rug to roll in it, and eat it. So, I can honestly say, my cats are fans. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this brand before, from a different website, and my cats LOVED it. One of them stole the bag, which I still haven't found, so I ordered from this seller on Amazon. It did not disappoint. Cats (three) absolutely LOVE this product! This bag will be kept under lock and key. LOL Yes, it does contain some sticks, which you can grind up in a spice grinder, but I've never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ankimo

customer_reviews.title: Good nip, but poor top design
customer_reviews.text: This catnip would be great if you could get it to come out of the can. Poor design on the top. The top just has holes in it and it’s like a Parmesan shaker- you know how the cheese only comes out for a second then it gets clogged? Same thing here. You have to pop the top off (not easy, as It’s not even a screw top !) and pour some out. Of course the cat loves it when it does come out so this is some high quality stuff they put in here. Just sad about the top.
customer_reviews.author: B C Berger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for catnip toys
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this product. I take old socks and fill them with catnip and tie them off. And throw them around the house. The cats are crazy about these. Is product of catnip is so inexpensive that I'm able to throw them away after a couple of months when they get so stained from the cats chewing on them. And then I just make more.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hallmark Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Container
customer_reviews.text: i love the container. i removed the label and put in my carry on with all my other spices that i was bringing back to Costa Rica and got it through TSA inspection!!! now i hope my kitty kats love it. i have only used it once and they barely noticed but they are that way sometimes so i cannot rate their love of it yet. (btw: i have had several containers of catnip in my checked luggage and they are confiscated as well as catnip toys)
customer_reviews.author: C. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: My cats love their new catnip!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like a fresh bottle! I made new catnip 'socks' for them when I got the new jar. I already had to replace one of them! He tore into it like a hyena. Then he took a good nap. It seems to last - they keep going back to their socks and having play time again and again. There is a lot in the bottle - it will keep them going for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MEOWWWWWW
customer_reviews.text: My cats have rates this 5 stars. They like to lick it, smell it and roll in it. Then after eating some, they fall into a stupor. The only thing they don't like is when mom closes up the bag and they can't get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cappie Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good brand, but cat didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand, but unfortunately my cat didn’t seem to like this catnip all that much. She has the gene though, in general she is very responsive to catnip, so I am not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Like a moth to a flame...my cat loves this catnip!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated for years to allow my cats catnip because it used to make them spaz out. Well now they are 13 and 14 years old and I was gifted two lovely cat beds that they had absolutely no interest in. Enter the catnip. I sprinkled some on the beds and KABOOM suddenly they were overwhelmingly interested! They love the beds, they love the catnip, and it calms them down and puts them into a calm sleep.
customer_reviews.author: misshattie

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: We think this must have lost its potency. Cats don't like it. They are usually over the moon for catnip. Not even interested in this.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Shultz

customer_reviews.title: cats go insane for this stuff...moreso than other catnip
customer_reviews.text: This catnip seems particularly strong than others I've given to my cats. Upon opening, the smell is VERY strong and my cats go crazy for this stuff, even moreso than other brands I've bought. Only negative is that the holes for the shaker do not effectively let the catnip out of the bottle. It's easier to just remove the whole cap...not a big deal to me, but I thought I would mention it
customer_reviews.author: esp

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: Well Sheldon seems to like the stuff i pick up the bottle and he comes running. Not sure what the little holes in flip top are for. He likes the top screwed off and just grabs a paw full himself.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Best catnip
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a lot of nip over the years ..mainly in person...I know, shameful right? lol Bought a ton on amazon too. This is the most consistently impressive product thus far...especially compared to the higher rated products. This will be my repeat order for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed, not good anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year or two back in the 2oz shaker bottle, and it was fantastic. Kept in freezer and cat adored it, ran out a month or two ago. Have purchased two of the new bags of SmartyKat and cat has ZERO interest.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My cat really loves this brand! I sprinkle it on her toys and she will play for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Is Addicted To The Nip--Look How Calm He Is
customer_reviews.text: My house cat loves catnip, especially this one. I hope to find a toy soon to fill it with! He is OBSESSED! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TofuSuperwoman

customer_reviews.title: Catnip Lobster
customer_reviews.text: Removing some stuffing from small floppy kids toys; replacing with catnip. Kitty is ape over lobster with floppy catnip claws that flop over her and trigger her attack mode. Catnip makes a 'no interest' toy into full-on favorite!
customer_reviews.author: lifeluvr

customer_reviews.title: First catnip my cat loves
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what it is about this catnip or what it is about my cat, but suddenly, she likes catnip. I have given away so much catnip to friends with cats because mine couldn't give a hoot about any of them. And then....we have this. Well, I'm happy and she's happy and that's how it goes sometimes --- everybody is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for Christmas for my cat and she went nuts. Loves this stuff. So funny I thought that the whole catnip driving cats mad was just a farce but she went crazy trying to rub that stuff all over herself.
customer_reviews.author: Aldana

customer_reviews.title: Our 3 cats love this catnip
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 cats love this catnip. I put it inside of socks and tie a knot at the end. Our cats are always grabbing the catnip filled socks and roll around with them or grab them and take of running around all cracker cat.
customer_reviews.author: Célestine

customer_reviews.title: Review for big container.
customer_reviews.text: Not the sellers fault, but my cat doesn't care about it, literally. I don't know why, maybe the ingredients are different or it was old. But he loves the small one the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Cats did not go bonkers for it.  Not sure if it is stale
customer_reviews.text: Cats did not like it. Have used catnip many times and my cats went nuts over it. This time nothing. Just walked away. Really disappointed as it is everything I wanted - organic and local. It was well packaged. If they had liked it I would have give 5 stars across the board.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: kitty won't bother
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old kitty has never turned her nose up at any catnip and waits every morning for her pinch of fun. I bought this, and she won't even bother with it. Maybe the package is old??? I still give it to her every morning, but that's to make me feel like I didn't waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Feline Addiction
customer_reviews.text: Well...it's catnip. My cats went apesh*t after opening; running from there, to who knows where? Climbing up their cat trees(and knocking them over), and spazzing out over the scratch posts whilst kissing and hugging it. This is a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I put some of it on my cats' stratching-house as the directions say, some minutes later my cats were so happy wallowing like crazy :), they showed very relaxed during that day. I think it is very useful for traveling to keep them calmed. It is important to not put very often because the effect won't be the same, it is recommended to put only once per month or when traveling, to go to vets, to adapt them to new friends, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Heaven Scented Catnip
customer_reviews.text: My diet/digestion sensitive cat loves this catnip! Not only does he roll in it, but he eats it as soon as I put some down for him. He digests it well. This product is a true treat for him! Especially after he takes his medication. It's a great value and the scent is heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: mustangsally007

customer_reviews.title: It's catnip for all your catnip purposes
customer_reviews.text: I put it on a cardboard scratcher my cat wasn't giving a second glance and suddenly it was her favorite thing. It's been over a week and she still uses it regularly even though I haven't reapplied the catnip. I did also realize the catnip was falling through the scratcher, so you'll have to watch out for that depending on what kind you have. But it didn't take much to get that result. 2oz seems like it will go a long way with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen L. Marten

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: The plastic jar is very hard to open. My cat likes a pinch or two so the shaker top does not do it. To many stems. The entire top is extremely hard for weak hand and difficult for strong hands to get off. I wish the shaker top would be replaced with a pour top maybe a quarter opened one big hole.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyseattle

customer_reviews.title: My cat is not interested.
customer_reviews.text: Not interested, not even a little. 7 yo tortie, not a kitten, absolutely not interested. It might as well have been cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Cat "Crack"
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a few catnip brands including bulk purchases and one of my cats was never interested. This catnip got all three of them even the "picky" tabby. They LOVED it! Much more aromatic than other brands and my cats and I do seriously recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Oldwetcat

customer_reviews.title: MY CATS LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle a little on their little scrunchy "catnip mat" and they LOVE IT !! Eat it, roll around, and purr. They literally beg for this organic catnip. Been using this brand for years. Always keep an extra jar so we don't run out. Love it - great product !
customer_reviews.author: Fran K.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Got a cat scratcher that had this. My cat went nuts for it. The other stuff we had she decided she didn't like but this stuff she is going crazy for. Had to find more to buy and found it here on Amazon at a great price. Now we have a happy (happy) cat.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great quality. Glad I was able to find some organic catnip for my cats. This container lasts my cats months. I have one cat that uses it properly and "sniffs" it and gets really hyper and my other cat loves to "eat" it and gets very relaxed (not sure if this is normal as all the cats i've had always sniffed it, but he's happy so its ok).
customer_reviews.author: Zanub

customer_reviews.title: My cats didn’t care about this nip
customer_reviews.text: My cats were kinda meh about this. Neither one seemed all that interested in it. They were more interested in the 10 year old catnip toys which were still good and they appeared to get more of the high you’d expect from catnip than this brand new catnip.
customer_reviews.author: Mel F.

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This will last my three cats a year. They like it and it keeps them from annoying me for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Charredtorso

customer_reviews.title: Possible choking pieces in mix
customer_reviews.text: I have written few reviews but felt I had to warn people about this catnip. My kitties did like the taste EXCEPT that it has stick-like pieces in the mix and one of my cats choked/gagged on it more than once so I stopped giving it to both of them. Wish the producers could pulverize this product more completely.
customer_reviews.author: RenoRoz

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff - One of my cats loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, one that loves this stuff, the other that doesn't care about it because it's not a treat or food. That said, the one that does like it cant get enough of the stuff! Highly recommend getting a canister if you have cats and would like to make their lives a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Mix it with a stronger nip
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great buy but needs to be more potent. The cap nip at dollar tree got more of a reaction then this one but he still likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this.
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea for a cat nip dispenser, however most of the bipmis bigger than the holes. So you end up unscrewing life to get a good amount out. My 2 cats however don’t care about the dispenser, just the product & they both approve with flying colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri L.

customer_reviews.title: Smarty no goody
customer_reviews.text: my TWO cats would not eat it,lick it or scratch it.It is very coarse ,not ground up well at all.I had to open the plastic shaker lid to get it out.I've tried it twice,but to no avail.Sorry!Send me a new product to try or a label to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh at all
customer_reviews.text: Have dried fresh Catnip before so know the smell of dried, one can instantly smell extremely old smelling herb. Cat has had fun with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sticks & Stems
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be all sticks and stems. Not really good for kitties insides. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: TJo

customer_reviews.title: Awful bottle
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is terrible. The lid will not screw on. Cheap plastic. The catnip is fine however.
customer_reviews.author: Deserteagle

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my cat who has used other catnip in the last without issues. I would suggest spending the extra money to get better catnip.
customer_reviews.author: Ausome Goods Co.

customer_reviews.title: Seems decent
customer_reviews.text: I would say this was pretty fresh, despite the sealed package and the fact that it was put in a plastic bag before boxing, one of my cats sniffed it right out. Found her laying on the Amazon box it was shipped in. Needless to say, I had to give them some of their Christmas presents early. Right now my cats are high AF.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't even touch this stuff. He smells it and just walks away. I don't know why this has so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Purrrrfect Treat
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? My cats love this - and it's organic. Win-win. The container is a generous size, so it lasts a while even with two catnip loving cats. I'd been buying it at the local Walmart, but the price on Amazon had them beat - and with Prime it arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: in the Berkshires

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My cats could not care less about this-- and they normally love catnip. The leaves are dark and it doesn't have much of a scent to it. The last brand I bought was bright green and they could literally smell it from the other room.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in two handmade cat toys. All my cats were trying to get in the two bags I had it in. It was also surround by about 30 skeins of yarn in the second bag. After a few months the cats these were gifted to are still playing with their cat nip toys!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Our 3 cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This brand is relatively inexpensive, but it is not a cheap product as far as our cats are concerned. The quantity that will last a long time. Great for attracting our cats to their toys and scratching boards. Not so strong that they pass out asleep afterwards, either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because my cat was completely disinterested. We had just finished another brand and my cat would go absolutely crazy each time we put it out. With this one, the cat ignored it and it just ended up littered all over the floor under the cat stand.
customer_reviews.author: Sabot Lu

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: Tried many catnip's for my cats and found this name brand the best. The last one I've bought from 'SmartyKat' wasn't as good because they've left alot large dry sticks in the mix. I didn't want my cats to choke so I manually took them out and took a long time doing this. In the past I didn't have to do this and the mix was good.
customer_reviews.author: andhum

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loved this catnip!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loved this catnip! She was happy and purring and playful. I'd recommend to anyone bringing home a cat that is older than a couple months old to grab some. She was scared and not sure about her environment but warmed up quickly after we crushed some catnip in front of her cage.The container it comes in seals nicely. There is quite a bit, which will surely last along time. For the price you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Janell Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitties!
customer_reviews.text: In 2015, I did Christmas shopping for ALL of my loved ones, including my elderly brown cat Smokey. A little dash of catnip and she's rolling around and drooling like the little cutie she is! I also gave some of Smokey's catnip to a younger cat I have named Piper. She was rolling around wide-eyed and cutesy-wutesy too! This was an awesome present for my animal babies!
customer_reviews.author: Garrison Haines-Temons

customer_reviews.title: well at least two of them like to get high from kitty cat nip as we ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say my cats, well at least two of them like to get high from kitty cat nip as we call it in the house. Obviously organic is the way to go as your cat if they are genetically crazy for catnip will lick and roll in it. Good product and fun when my one cat licks it and 5 minutes later runs from room to room chasing some phantom who knows what!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this
customer_reviews.text: My cats look forward to this treat every night after their supper.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tischa Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Cats uninterested
customer_reviews.text: After a couple days of use both of my cats became uninterested in this “catnip”. This has never happened with any other brand. They usually beg me for it and try to break into the stash. Poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves This
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats is slightly interested in this catnip. The other one gets her catnip in the same place every day. She'll go over to the place and look at me until I sprinkle a bit on the floor. She is mad for it! She is a shy rescue cat who was quite skittish and fearful for a while, and it's great to see her so pleased and happy. I've heard that response to catnip is genetically determined.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. my cat loved it and even better he ate all of this one, sooo no clean up! i normally get the spray, but this was a great buy. and I know some people are getting fake nip on amazon, this def wasnt
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Same product (1oz) at Walmart cost $22. Same product with 2 oz fi
customer_reviews.text: Our cat goes nuts for this stuff but it was costing us $22 for 1oz. Amazon carried 2 oz for $4.98. I received package in just barely under 24 hours. Outstanding deal and can't beat prices and efficiency
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put this on my kitties toys and it was so funny watching them
customer_reviews.text: My kitty cats love this. I sprinkle it on their choice and they are just so funny to watch. Thank you so much for your product and thank you so much for the super fast shipping. We will do business again
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Haigler Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff - my cats love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this brand. We got a sample once with a cat toy and I have been looking for it ever since. The sample came in an unmarked mini sized clear test tube version of this container with a purple lid so I kept looking for nips with the purple lid. Found this one and it is the one I have been searching for. My cats go nuts for it.
customer_reviews.author: DenverMom46

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why, but be doesn't like it. I tried it a few times and he sniffs it and tries to bury it. He has had catnip before that he liked, so... :(
customer_reviews.author: Alis

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you want your cats and kitties to have a little taste
customer_reviews.text: True to it’s description, one minute my cat was flying back and forth across the house, next minute sis was laying out somewhere like she was on a nude beach. Lol. Yes I’d definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Shequora

customer_reviews.title: My Cat says 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this. My DOGS even love it! Who knew! I thought my Chihuahua mix would hate it, seeing as it's peppermint scented, but he wanted to grab the whole bag. Even my Schnauzer wanted it. I put some in the palm of my hand and HE ate it! I'm not sure if it's OK for dogs to eat catnip but they seemed to LIKE it. I just know my cat enjoys it a lot. It's great quality and there's a lot in the bag. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Kitties liked it!
customer_reviews.text: Picked it up at the post office and put it in my purse. When I got home, I think it took about 10 min. for the cats to open my purse and the small package and finish it off, before I noticed. Guess it was a hit! But, too small for seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE it. Product arrived on time. I have made several toys and mu cats go wild. I bought this about a year ago and is still fresh and strong. I like to keep it in a cool dark place because it helps maintain the potency. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lovecats

customer_reviews.title: Cats love their Nip
customer_reviews.text: Catnip. Cats love it. This gets them through until it’s Fresh Catnip Season !!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitty 😻
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it! 😻 I dont know why all the bad reviews, my cat really happy. He rolls around on it and eats it. It's not fake, if it was my cat wouldn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Smarty Cat Catnip Review...
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, my cats did not like this much. They have reacted better with other versions of catnip, but this one did not seem to have any effect on them.
customer_reviews.author: Candle22

customer_reviews.title: My cats won't go anywhere near this stuff and they all love catnip.
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 cats who all love catnip they purr really loud while rolling in it and eating it. However, I bought 2 jars of this and not one of my cats would go near it. In fact I bought 2 scratching pads with the catnip and I put the catnip on 1 but not on the other and the cats only play with the one without the catnip on it. I've never seen them react like this before but they really disliked it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Monday

customer_reviews.title: This organic catnip is the one our cats love
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've purchased organic catnip and it must've been old because the cats barely noticed it. But this stuff is the real deal ... on our third package! :)
customer_reviews.author: aaron-the-baron

customer_reviews.title: ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced rubbish. Cat completely ignores. Manufacturer promises refund but will only send another item "of their choosing " waste of precious time & money.
customer_reviews.author: KF Az

customer_reviews.title: The canister is a generous size at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes crazy over this catnip. We have tried several brands over her 15 years of life, and SmartyKat prompts the most enthusiastic response. It has a strong scent (not unpleasant), and is a darker green and less brittle than other brands. The canister is a generous size at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: K & M

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Organic
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal for 2 oz. of Organic Catnip! 2 oz. doesn't sound like much, but is actually a large jar. My cat truly enjoys it-great to rub on his scratcher and fill catnip toys! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: symphonyfan

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to get this locally lately and so glad to find it on Amazon. My cat loves this and it's a special treat when she has been good.
customer_reviews.author: helenvan

product_meta.title: SmartyKat Certified Organic Catnip
product_meta.description: Size:2 oz. CanisterSmartyKat Organic Catnip is 100% certified organic without chemicals, pesticides or other fillers, which makes it the safe, pure and potent choice for your cat. Catnip naturally stimulates most cats, providing a burst of playful energy, usually followed by a mellow period. It attracts cats like a magnet and can be used to lure cats to toys, scratchers and bedding. The 2 ounce canister allows you to shake or pour catnip. SmartyKat gives pet parents the best of all worlds: innovative products, stylish designs, environmental responsibility, and exceptional value with a variety of toys to meet a cat’s need for play, scratching, wellness, rest, and fun! A member of the Worldwise family of pet products, SmartyKat is grounded in the principles of pet safety, customer satisfaction, and environmental responsibility. SmartyKat products are designed to meet or exceed all applicable safety standards. They are then tested against those standards to ensure they meet our strict quality and safety requirements – ensuring they’re safe for all members of your family. SmartyKat offers a complete satisfaction guarantee. If a customer is dissatisfied with a SmartyKat product for any reason, they will replace it or refund it.
feature_bullets: 100% certified organic catnip is safe, pure & potent without chemicals, pesticides or fillers
2 ounce canister allows you to shake or pour catnip
Catnip provides a burst of playful energy
Use catnip to attract cats to toys, scratchers and bedding
